name: Lost In Dreams (Botato Games, EmilyStar)
description:
Lost In Dreams

This game is our submission to VimJam.

Can you find the end to the little girl's dreams?

Explore the dream, collect items that enhance your dream time, and defeat the scary monsters!

Game Controls

Use the mouse and WASD/ZQSD to control the character.

How to play

Go into the dream to collect items which enhance the health, damage, and dream time of your character. Make sure to get back to the portal to keep the items you collected, as otherwise they will be lost!
